pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:0.4: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:0.5: 92. The training rules on getting novice nuns to massage
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.2: At that time the nuns were getting novice nuns to massage and rub them.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:1.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
